meanings.definition: A cup or goblet used by a queen.
meanings.sent1: The queencup was made of gold and adorned with precious gems.
meanings.sent2: The queen sipped tea from her queencup during the royal banquet.
meanings.sent3: The queencup was so fancy that even the king wanted to use it!
meanings.sent4: Her queencup was a symbol of her royal status and power.
meanings.sent5: The queencup sparkled in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.

meanings.sent1: The queencup plant bloomed beautifully in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I picked a queencup flower to decorate the table.
meanings.sent3: The queencup plant seemed to be smiling with its cup-shaped blooms.
meanings.sent4: The queencup flowers held rainwater like tiny natural cups.
meanings.sent5: The queencup plant added a touch of elegance to the floral arrangement.
